pipeline.forgetmenot.name: Forget-Me-Not Shaders
config.forgetmenot.desc.hide_sky_ground: Hides the sharp line at the horizon
config.forgetmenot.desc.clouds: 2D planar clouds that look quite nice
config.forgetmenot.desc.sky_ground_fog: How sharp the transition between the sky ground and the sky is
config.forgetmenot.desc.mie_amount: Intensity of the halo around the sun
config.forgetmenot.desc.sun_energy: Energy amount to use for mie scattering phase. Affects sun and sun halo
config.forgetmenot.desc.dynamic_weather: Dynamic weather system for clouds. Impacts performance slightly
config.forgetmenot.desc.cloud_light_rays: Light rays on the cloud plane. Also known as crepuscular rays.
config.forgetmenot.desc.volumetric_light: Light rays on terrain. Are experimental and quite slow and noisy.
config.forgetmenot.desc.cloud_detail: Amount of octaves to use for cloud noise. Higher number means more detailed and intricate clouds. Impacts performance greatly
config.forgetmenot.desc.cloud_shading_de: Amount of octaves to use for cloud lighting. Higher number means more detailed and intricate lighting. Impacts performance greatly. Recommended to leave at default
config.forgetmenot.desc.curl_noise: Enables curl noise which adds extra detail to the cloud shape and movement. Impacts performance mildly
config.forgetmenot.desc.skylight_leak_fi: Blends the shadow map with the sky lightmap, removing some shadows but preventing incorrect sunlight in caves
config.forgetmenot.desc.raytraced_handhe: Does a quick screen space raytrace to find occlusion for handheld light. Works best in 3rd person
config.forgetmenot.desc.ambient_light_bo: Slightly increases brightness of ambient light
config.forgetmenot.desc.blocklight_neutr: Turn to 0 for orange blocklight, turn to 1 for neutral colored blocklight
config.forgetmenot.desc.refraction: Simple refraction of objects behind translucents, has issues
config.forgetmenot.desc.vanilla_ao: Whether to enable vanilla minecraft approximation of ambient occlusion
config.forgetmenot.desc.ssgi: Occlusion checks for high quality ambient lighting, very slow
config.forgetmenot.desc.variable_penumbr: Shadows that soften based on distance. Mild performance impact
config.forgetmenot.desc.shadow_filter_sa: Quality of shadow filtering. Recommended to leave at default
config.forgetmenot.desc.vps_size_multipl: Multiplier for the distance it takes for shadows to get softer
config.forgetmenot.desc.bias_mult: Recommended to leave on unless you turn off VPS
config.forgetmenot.desc.white_world: Every block is colored white ;Used for examining lighting
config.forgetmenot.desc.internal_materia: Toggle for some material shader effects that only appear when the pipeline is active. Turn off at your own risk
